**DateField**
```js
<FieldWidget field={testData.user._meta.fields.dateJoined} />
```

**DateTimeField**
```js
<FieldWidget field={testData.user._meta.fields.dateJoined} value="2017-01-01 23:20" />
```

**BooleanField**
```js
<FieldWidget field={testData.user._meta.fields.isActive} value={true} />
```
